title: Biden Must Be Impeached (Ep 1872)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning admission by the Biden Administration that should lead to his impeachment. 

News Picks:

Our debt situation is growing dire.


Demand for riskier home loans is increasing. Sound familiar? 

Inflation comes in hotter than expected.

Who is going to buy all of this US debt?



Shipping volume is dropping like a rock. This is a bad sign.
